item.title: Software Methodologies
item.description: At the end of the day, software methodologies are all some form of Development Lifecycle. That is to say, the individuals unit of work, the team’s unit of work and the business, are in one of several stages. Requirements and Planning Analysis and Design Implementation Testing and Verification Deployment and Maintenance That is it.
